name: City Road Drag
description:
Twist and turn through heavy traffic. Nitro your your way up the endless highway look out for the big truck.

Cut close to get BONUS

Collect coin on your way to buy upgrades and new cars.

FEATURES
- First person camera view
- 5 Amazing cars to choose from
- Real sounds
- Detailed environments with day and night variations
- Online leaderboards

"Keep the fun in the Game and drive safe"

Gamebread "live to play"

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Find more information at our fan page:
https://www.facebook.com/gamebread
